name: react-email-intl-starter
description: Starter project for react-email with internationalization

scripts.dev: pnpm codegen && concurrently "pnpm codegen:watch" "email dev --dir compiled" -c "bgGreen.bold,bgBlue.bold" -n "codegen,react-email"
scripts.dev:deployable: pnpm codegen --no-preview-props && concurrently "pnpm codegen:watch --no-preview-props" "email dev --dir compiled" -c "bgGreen.bold,bgBlue.bold" -n "codegen,react-email"
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production pnpm codegen && NODE_ENV=production email build --packageManager=pnpm --dir compiled
scripts.export: NODE_ENV=production pnpm codegen && NODE_ENV=production email export --pretty false --dir compiled

author: Pra3t0r5
